title: Mystery on the Jordan River
description: In this Dateline classic, a teenage girl is murdered at a scenic spot on a Utah river. The case almost goes cold until Jaclyn Moore, a hairdresser turned detective, finds the truth. Originally aired on NBC on May 6, 2016.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
